item.description:
The message below forwarded from Bob Boudreau. Please email him questions at hits2222@verizon.net.

I have participated in this program for years. The coaching is excellent and has made me a better player, indoors & out.

The head coach is again Warren Kerr.

Matt
-- 

Men's HITS Tryouts, Thursday, 25 August 2011.  Waltham HS, doors open at 6:30PM for warmups, and we hold Tryouts 7 - 9PM.  If you have never participated, you can find the HITS Program Description on the HITS Website, at hitsvolleyball.com.    Tryout Cost: $15.  11 Week HITS Program Cost: $180.   If you are definitely at Tryouts, let me know, and I can get a head start on the Tryouts Rosters. If you are unsure about participation in HITS, then attend Tryouts, and make an informed decision.

The men's program will run every Thursday.

See separate event for Women's HITS on 8/30.

Bob Boudreau

hits2222@verizon.net
item.how_to_find_us: Gym at the back of complex
item.name: Men's Coached Drills
